On [[Avenged Sevenfold]]'s [[Avenged Sevenfold (album)|self-titled album]], the song A Little Piece of Heaven features necrophilia as a theme. In the animated video for the song, a guy proposes to a girl who rejects him. He then [[kill]]s her and preserves her [[corpse]], [[Cannibalism|eating her heart]] and then having [[sex]] with her. The girl comes back to life and kills him. The two make up and then go on a [[killing spree]] before getting married in [[Hell]]. [[Slayer]] have also written about necrophilia on their 1986 album "Reign in Blood". It should be noted that Slayer is about 400 times more badass than Avenged Sevenfold.
